venue.name: In front of St. Marie's Church

item.description: Local historian Robert B. Perreault will lead his popular tour of the West Side that focuses on the history and contributions of the French-speaking immigrants from Quebec and their descendants. Learn about the development of Ste. Marie's parish, Notre Dame Hospital (now Catholic Medical Center), La Caisse Populaire Ste. Marie (St. Mary's Bank), and much more. The tour lasts from 1:30 p.m.-3:30 p.m. Pre-registration is required. Please wear comfortable walking shoes. MHA MEMBERS $5.00 - GENERAL PUBLIC $10.00.
item.name: Walking Tour of the Franco-American West Side
